short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Skip specific configured timespans in YouTube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you watch Youtube with children and want to skip some moments you find not appropiate for them. But siting beside and forwarding video is not a good option  - you can do that now with this extention by just providing timespans you want to skip. If saves them for specific Youtube video id in browser localstorage so you should not enter it agan for another wathing (of course until you clean the browser cache). Extention monitor video currentTime and skip timespans which you provided in option window.
